text:
Abdon Alinovi (6 May 1923 – 15 February 2018) was an Italian politician. He was born in Eboli, Italy. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. In 1976, Alinovi was elected in the Chamber of Deputies, representing Naples until 1992.
Alinovi died in Naples at the age of 94 on 15 February 2018 of Alzheimer's disease.
